title: I will post a Touhou song everyday until
body:
GD learns what a weeb actually is. Which I realize is perpetuating a stereotype but screw it.

Wondering what Touhou is? Read these quotes for more information, that should give you a good idea:

> [{quoted}](name=Guiotine,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=nZTYMvZp,comment-id=001d0000,timestamp=2015-04-27T19:08:20.004+0000)
> it's a series of japanese indie bullet hell games, known for the characters, music, and difficulty. The gameplay itself is pretty simple and story is near nonexistent, but they're very fun. 
> 
> If you're wondering what bullet hell means, well...
> 
> http://bbsimg.ngfiles.com/15/22354000/ngbbs4d38a1859a66b.jpg
> 
> http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-z6fyrea54do/U9hKNJSAmwI/AAAAAAAAAFM/jBoJC0dc1io/s1600/ultimate+rain+dodging.png
> 
> http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-3YyC9qT_JSo/TqLj_OP1-LI/AAAAAAAAARU/RRIS3cxkp78/s1600/touhou08qs7.png
> 
> it's basically that.

.

> [{quoted}](name=Slipknife,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=nZTYMvZp,comment-id=00630000,timestamp=2015-05-16T01:03:57.667+0000)
>
> OMG best anime.  Great VN.
> 
> Yea, no seriously.  It's a vertical scrolling Bullet Hell/Danmaku game that has you play as one of a selection of characters through several stages.  The games themselves are not INCREDIBLY impressive on their own, what's impressive is that all the official games outside of the fighters are done ENTIRELY by one person, art, music and all.  That and the fact that the fandom takes random snippets of conversation and builds MASSIVE character development out of them.  
> 
> Here's a video primer.
> 
> https://youtu.be/yrmmD8avIhs

.

> [{quoted}](name=The Vi Guy,realm=EUNE,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=nZTYMvZp,comment-id=0088,timestamp=2015-05-24T20:45:50.547+0000)
>
> did anyone post the Touhou 101 video yet? 
> im not going through 16 pages looking for that shit.
> 
> Anyway it should be in the OP 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E7lHJXPKoX0

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yn3GPjhtYJ8

~~Join us.~~

Note: this song never actually appeared in the games afaik, but on a separate album composed by the same guy. Still a Touhou song nevertheless.

Thanks to Metaspark for providing character descriptions.

edit: added a new one as a part of discussion, but I'll count it anyway. [Number two](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/nZTYMvZp-i-will-post-a-touhou-song-everyday-until?show=flat&comment=0005000000000000) is Yuyuko's theme from SWR: Bloom Nobly, Cherry Blossoms of Sumizome ~ Border of Life

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tlhxImY0WaY

[Number three is up!](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/nZTYMvZp-i-will-post-a-touhou-song-everyday-until?show=flat&comment=0006) -- the MoF Stage 4 theme: Fall of Fall ~ Autumnal Waterfall. [(Read about Momiji, the white wolf tengu who guards the waterfall here!)](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/nZTYMvZp-i-will-post-a-touhou-song-everyday-until?show=flat&comment=004a)
